title: Solved Mysteries; or, Revelations of a City Detective
author: Macgovan, James.
snippet: The dog-stealing business was in a depressed state, andNick Jordan slouched along Clerk Street with his hands in hispockets, groaning over the dull times, like other business men,and wondering what the world was coming to. Nick was aman of great parts, who had been kept back in the world byignorance, for beyond dogs he knew nothing.

title: An editor's retrospect;
author: Cooper, Charles Alfred
snippet: Another street adventure of mine brought home to me in a striking way the more or less unpleasant conviction that years were leaving their mark upon me. On a fine May morning I was walking home along Clerk Street in Edinburgh. The air was pleasantly warm and delightfully fresh after a hot night in the editorial room.

title: Solved Mysteries; or, Revelations of a City Detective
author: Macgovan, James.
snippet: " Oh, easy ! He just followed the lad that kept the key ootto Clerk Street. It was a Saturday nicht, and the streetswere thrang, but he never got a chance o' a touch till the fellystopped at a paper shop window in Clerk Street. The keywas in his coat pocket, and Mike took it oot while they werebaith lookin' at the pictur's in the Police News.

title: Solved Mysteries; or, Revelations of a City Detective
author: Macgovan, James.
snippet: " But how did he do it ? How did he get possession of thekey ? " I asked, incredulously. " Oh, easy ! He just followed the lad that kept the key ootto Clerk Street. It was a Saturday nicht, and the streetswere thrang, but he never got a chance o' a touch till the fellystopped at a paper shop window in Clerk Street.

title: Brought to Bay; or, Experiences of a City Detective
author: Macgovan, James.
snippet: But in this I was wrong, as I have now to show. On the night following this meeting, Eliza and Agnes, whowere alone in their home in Clerk Street, were surprised by theintimation that a strange man was at the door demanding tosee them. They both fluttered out in dismay, only to findtheir worst fears confirmed.
